translations: 去野餐（picnic 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: When camping or picnicking, use facilities provided.
sentences.translation: 当露营或野餐时，请使用提供的设施。

sentences.sentence: Nicky and Mark are picnicking on a moonlight beach.
sentences.translation: 尼基和马克正在月光下的海滩上野餐。

sentences.sentence: Maybe your family enjoys "picnicking" or "riding bikes".
sentences.translation: 可能你的家庭喜欢“ picnicking ”或者“ riding bikes ”。
